author: spencer smith
comment: Ok the app for everything you say it is seems spot on! Great work! The only thing keeping it back from being perfect is 1. In app ads.... Literally i don't mind paying the 0.99-2.99 in app purchase for the ads to go away i just can't stand them... 2. If there is a way would like to see the current bluetooth devices connected to the phone 3. Would like to be able to disable and enable the wifi 4. Would also hope to see a way to select which wifi networks or bluetooth devices i connect to ? I know the last one is far fetched but will definitely give 5 stars if we can do something about the ads

author: Brad Sinclair
comment: Great app does what I was looking for.   But it would be great if you could add support for dual sim phones so you can display both cell signals the phone pick is nice but you can use this realestate for the other signal info when sim 2 is on in settings   If you made an option for always on the screen indicators (like in the system tray or something) for cell signals and WiFi So you can see when you loose or gain signal at a glance i would pay for it!!!!!!!

reply.author: WΛLLTΞCH
reply.content: Thank you very much! I'll start working on it!

author: Timo D
comment: Good but high Power drain on my Huawei Watch. It looks like the apps is not going to sleep because my phone also offen wakes up from the App.  If this is fixed 5 STARS!

reply.author: WΛLLTΞCH
reply.content: I have implemented a quit on ambient behavior that should fix your power issues. Let me know what you think and if it's worth updating your rating! -Update- Hi Timothy, it's been over a month, how do you like the update?

author: Jacob Haarstad
comment: This app is what I have been looking for. Provides simple signal and WiFi status. I do wish I could keep the app open in the same spot the notifications show up, that way I don't have to open the app itself. Is there any way to do that?

reply.author: WΛLLTΞCH
reply.content: Hi Jacob! I'm so glad you like the app! So you'd like a display in the notifications bar of the statistics? I'll look into it! What kind of features/data would you like to see, and how?

title: Great app.

author: John Newman
comment: Great app with a very attentive developer. This facility has been strangely absent from the Wear platform and this is a very classy iteration. It is elegant and, since the last update, functions perfectly on my SW3 with my Galaxy Note 3. Have never known a developer to react so quickly to problems pointed out by users. Highly recommended.

reply.author: WΛLLTΞCH
reply.content:
Hi John!
Thank you very much, that update should go live in the next few days. Some phones require the wakeups, but not all, so it will be an option with the next update. Thank you!
-John
